descriptionHtml:
Spells can be found outside Riverwood
Spells VampireGrip (Human Form), Summon Thrall 60 sec and Power Summon Thrall Until he dies

!!Download the updated verision if you want VampireGrip to absorb health!!

THIS MOD REQUIRES DAWNGUARD
Video Tutorial : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eQvk9XIEnXE&feature=plcp
This is one of my first mods called VampirePack, it adds 3 new spells 2 of them, are almost the same and the other one is VampiricGrip Human form (You Dont need to be in Vampire Lord Form ). Vamparic Grip absorbs health (Updated). These Spells Work even if your not a vampire, I couldent get it to work for only vampires.
This mod is made entirely from me.
I will continue to update this mod as soon as i can.
THIS MOD REQUIRES DAWNGUARD
author: Rameloz
